item.name: Copper Ore
item.description: One of the softest ores there is. Yet it is still suitable for armour with basic protection.

item.name: Iron Ore
item.description: Sturdy ore

item.name: Gold Ore
item.description: One of the rarest ores found in nearby areas. You could craft great gear with this ore.

item.name: Ruby
item.description: Expert craftsmiths seek this gem for making jewelry. You could use this as payment for crafting gear.

item.name: Sapphire
item.description: One of the rarer gems found in the caves.

item.name: Emerald
item.description: Legendary gem craftsmiths all around the world wish to lay their hands upon.

item.name: Vines
item.description: Flexible material harvested from various trees and bushes. Quite flexible.

item.name: Log
item.description: A chunk of wood that was cut out from trees.

item.name: Copper pickaxe
item.description: You could mine some sturdier ore with this in your hands.

item.name: Iron pickaxe
item.description: Pickaxe made of a strong material and crafted by expert craftsmith.

item.name: Gold pickaxe
item.description: Not only this pickaxe really shine, it mines really well aswell.

item.name: Ruby necklace
item.description: You feel a life pulsating from the gem carved inside the necklace.

item.name: Sapphire necklace
item.description: The necklace gives off scent of ocean.

item.name: Emerald necklace
item.description: You can feel surging energy from the necklace.

item.name: Wooden sticks
item.description: Little wooden sticks clumped together.

item.name: Stone
item.description: A heavy boulder. Don't drop it on your feet.

item.name: Copper sword
item.description: Not really sharp sword.

item.name: Iron sword
item.description: Really sharp iron sword. You could cut wood with this sword.

item.name: Golden sword
item.description: Sword worthy of a knight. You feel like you could cut throught the earth.

item.name: Slime goo
item.description: A slime goo that was extracted from the remains of a slain slime.

item.name: Wolf fang
item.description: If only it would be a bit tougher, you could use it as a dagger!

item.name: Bat wing
item.description: Wing that was cut off bat corpse.

item.name: Spider silk
item.description: Silk extracted from monstrous spider that is tougher than steel while remaining really flexible.

item.name: Red flower
item.description: A little beautiful blooming red flower that could make some girl happy.

item.name: Copper armour
item.description: Weak but atleast it provides basic protection

item.name: Iron Armour
item.description: Tough armour made from tough material. You feel safe wearing this armour.

item.name: Golden Armour
item.description: Armour that knights armour is made from in capital city Coopera.

item.name: Slime ring
item.description: Slime goo was inserted inside ruby gem. You feel more alive when you wear this ring.

item.name: Wolf necklace
item.description: You feel empowered when wearing this necklace.

item.name: Bat helmet
item.description: Slime goo seemed to revive wings of fallen bat. Now it helps you to move more faster

item.name: Spider whip
item.description: You feel like cowboy in the west.

item.name: Orange flower
item.description: A little beautiful blooming orange flower that could make some girl happy.
